channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Transforming Food Systems Could Help Tackle Global Warming, Study Finds
item.description: The study by the EAT-Lancet Commission warns food systems currently account for nearly a third (30%) of total global greenhouse gas emissions.

item.title: Mira Murati’s Thinking Machines Lab Unveils New AI Tinker Product Which Is Useful But Not A Big-Time Blockbuster
item.description: Famed Mira Murati and her co-founded startup TML released their first-ever product, Tinker. I explain the problem that Tinker aims to solve. And what ...

item.title: Nearly 80% Of Americans And Most MAGA Republicans Want ACA Tax Credits, Poll Shows
item.description: Nearly 80% of Americans - and more than half of MAGA Republicans - want Congress to extend tax credits for those with Obamcare health insurance, a KFF...

item.title: What’s The Earliest Chris Jericho Can Return To WWE? Why Huge PLE Is Most Likely
item.description: At 55, Chris Jericho is set for free agency. When can he make his historic WWE return for a final run and Hall of Fame push?

item.title: Baseus Reveals Nomos NU1 Air Spacemate 12-In-1 Docking Station Specially For Macs
item.description: Baseus,has launched the Baseus Nomos NU1 Air Spacemate 12-in-1 (MAC) Docking Station in Space Grey, offering powerful connectivity for home, office.

item.title: Two kinds of confrontations
item.description: When we win by having someone else lose, we set up a conflict. It’s clear, direct but not generative. But when we win by confronting our fear, everyon...

item.title: Reciprocity
item.description: Our biggest commitments, the things we are most dedicated to, rarely pay us back in equal measure. That might be the point.

item.title: Recalculating the cost of convenience
item.description: Convenience is seductive, and we trade precious things away for it all the time. Part of the reason it dominates our lives is that we only consider th...

item.title: “Because I said so”
item.description: This is the quickest and most direct way to manage. In the short run, compliance is predictable and might even be effective. Over time, it’s always ou...

item.title: Acceleration is felt, velocity is ignored
item.description: On an airplane, we notice even tiny changes in acceleration (including direction) but we’re completely unaware that we’re traveling at hundreds of mil...
